csw:Record.dct:abstract:
'''Short description:''' NorthWest Shelf area - near real-time (NRT) in situ quality controlled observations, hourly updated and distributed by INSTAC within 24-48 hours from acquisition in average
'''DOI (product) :''' https://doi.org/10.48670/moi-00045
